Title: Bondage and Beta Male Sexuality
Plot: Jeff helps Duncan romance Britta; Britta runs into some old anarchist friends and discovers they've moved on; Abed accidentally destroys some of Hickey's drawings; Chang has a supernatural experience.
GuestStars: Jonathan Banks, John Oliver, Barak Hardley, Emily Chang, David Schroeder, Tom Fonss, Linna Carter, Eddie Jackson
